parameters.description: The fact table that contains the fact or measure which needs aggregating
The column in the fact table that you'd like the iteration engine to agggregate

encoding.name: Min of =
encoding.description: Aggregates a fact or measure in a fact table via Min

instructions:
Specify the fact table and column for which the min aggregation should occur.  

Note:  Run the generator for this template for ALL facts/measures that you want to have a base measure for before running other more complex measures that would call base measures like this.
description: A simple min aggregation of a fact
